drupalNodeEvent.title: Influencing policymakers – making your China research count - CHERN research and communication skills workshop

field_organizers.processed: China in Europe Research Network, Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam (Chair)

field_description.processed: In another CHERN research and communication skills workshop, entitled Influencing policymakers – making your China research count, participants will learn how to communicate academic research to a policy-oriented audience – a much-needed skill in today’s world. The workshop is held by Charles Parton, Senior Associate Fellow at the Royal United Services Institute think tank and former British diplomat.
